channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023061707
item.description:
Report X-2023061707

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-26
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE PREVIOUS FACILITY. DescribePack: THE PLASTIC JERRICAN WAS PUNCTURED BY A BOLT AT THE BOTTOM CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO SLOWLY LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report I-2023060140
item.description:
Report I-2023060140

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-12
  • City: elkridge
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: NEW PENN MOTOR EXPRESS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading 4 drums were punctured by the forklift. The release was properly managed. The damaged drum were placed into a salvage drum and are being held pending disposition from the shipper

item.title: Report X-2023061629
item.description:
Report X-2023061629

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED, PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED LEAKAGE. PACKAGE WAS SEPARATED FROM OTHER PACKAGES AND PLACED IN RED HAZMAT BIN WITH PLASTIC BAG. DescribePack: THE CONTAINER TOP WAS LEAKING FLUID DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS SEPARATED FROM OTHER PACKAGES AND SENT TO DESIGNATED AREA.
